overview: Just when those white boys thought it was safe, another collection of black, ass-loving studs make it back into town for some of the hottest, horniest interracial action around. That said, these young honkies just can’t get enough of dark meat – and, as always, it doesn’t take a genius to realise why! For if it’s size that you’re after then these handsome black studs are most definitely a dream ticket in every sense. What’s more, they know exactly how to use their extra inches – as these cute white asses are about to find out!
title: Black Does White 7
